sourcesContent:
import {} from 'vue'
import {vueI18n} from "vue-i18n"
import langEn from"./en.json"
import langVn from"./vi.json"
const language = {
    en: langEn,
    vn: langVn
}
Vue.use(vueI18n)
const i18n = new vueI18n({
    locale: 'vn',
    messages: language,
})
export default i18n
